website_summaries.verdict: This is a versatile mirror that enables you to quickly see how you'll look in different lights and it's compact enough for travel.
pros: Four adjustable light settings for day, office, evening, and home
Folds flat for travel or storage
Electrical cord built-in so you don't need to rely on batteries
cons: Users have said that the slider for changing the light settings doesn't work very well

customer_reviews.title: Holy bright lights, Batman!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I did not expect this mirror to be so bright! The colors are pretty artificial, but it provides more than enough lighting to get the job done. I was coming off of one of those Chinese led mirrors though, which was PATHETIC!!!!! But ya, I'm VERY happy with my new mirror!!
customer_reviews.author: Vilanya

customer_reviews.title: A great light-up trifold make-up mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tri-fold make-up mirror. It has different lighting settings. The lights are very bright and help when applying makeup. What I also find helpful is to be able to plug in a curling iron into the outlet in the front of unit. I recommend this light-up make-up mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wright

customer_reviews.title: It is not "White" as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mirrors and the magnification is perfect. Love the way the middle mirror tilts up and down vs. sideways. So far the lights are perfect. Was disappointed with the color :-( It advertised as being White, it is not!!! It's a light lilac/purpleish color with bright florescent colors by the light adjustment. Really clashes with my new vanity area, but decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: "G"

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job, but is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I needed to order this as I needed the magnification after I lost my near sight. The magnification is good. The lighting is great with many different settings. No fun house face or anything. It is cheaply made. It is quite clunky and the back support to hold it upright when in use- the slots are too far back so it can be difficult to see as it does not sit upright. The plastic is cheap and mine had a crack in it after day 2. It is bulky so I do not know about traveling with it and how it would fare. But at least I can see to put my mascara on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisam

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile but some mirror distortion.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a nearly-like Clairol mirror I had for decades and loved. This is the closest replacement I could find. I am disappointed that one of the larger mirrors reflects a severely distorted image if you are any more than 10 inches from the mirror. Other mirrors are good and offer a variety of image sizes and views. As I do not use it for travel, I have no knowledge of that situation. It does stay in place on my tile vanity but I need to use the overhead light for added illumination. It has a plug in on the front of the unit that some may find beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Ivy

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you are looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Stop looking, this is the one! I LOVE mine! I had one almost like it for years and years but this one is sooooo much better! The magnification is awesome and the mirror is big enough to see your whole face unlike others I looked at. Will it make your counter look glamorous? No. Putting it away is an easy thing to do every day. If you want to see things that you wish you had seen five years ago 😄, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Nuts4dogs

customer_reviews.title: This is OK
customer_reviews.text: I must say I'm not sure how long this mirror will last. It doesn't seem to sit properly on my dresser. The light is not as bright as my Clairol one that I had for ages. But, in a pinch, it'll work. I like really bright light - The day light has a pinkish hue so my face looks reddish. When I go to my bathroom mirror, it looks fine. I think the way the circular light unit was designed, they allowed other colors to come through. I will search for something else at another time. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for this mirror
customer_reviews.text: The cord went out on my other brand mirror. I bought a replacement but the 5x was not like my old mirror. It was too distorted to use. I bought this brand as a 2nd replacement option. I don't need the side mirrors that fold out. I will only use the Day setting. But the 5x magnification is perfect like my old mirror and just what I needed. So I am thankful someone still makes a lighted mirror of significant size and use with 5x magnification. It could be redesigned without the side mirrors and multiple useless light settings for simplification and easier handling.
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: Great Makeup Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Jerdon makeup mirror for over 25 years. My original finally gave up the ghost, so I purchased a different brand. It was not what I was used to as far as magnification and quality goes. So, I bought the new version of my Jerdon and I love it. The only difference is that now there is an on/off switch instead of the press and hold switch. I consider that an improvement. The lighting selection on this mirror is much more realistic than the other brand that I tried. I highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Jomarkind

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself this mirror several years ago. As I have gotten older, I am having a hard time seeing well enough to put on eyeliner or other cosmetics that take a little more precision of application. This does it for me. The choice of lighting options is also very helpful.... Office-- Night. Anyway, my friend saw this one day and had a fit!! So, for her birthday, she got this mirror. Let me just say that it made her day/year. She loves it too. The price is right, the lighting is great and the magnification is great for these old eyes. Even old girls like to be pretty too !
customer_reviews.author: Escapereader

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd one!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect makeup mirror. Searched high and low for a better one and none could comparable. 5x magnification is distortion free. Closes with hinged doors to protect the hlass if traveling. Outlet for dryer, curling iron etc. Nice bright bulbs. Not sure if bulbs are replaceable.. however I've been using my first one everyday for 3 years with no issue. Great price too. The only cons to this are: Bulb replacement. (A padded travel bag would be perfect!) If you are contemplating a purchase, I recommend. Little disappointment with this!
customer_reviews.author: TRIXZEE

customer_reviews.title: Everything's great except for the little knob that switches the light ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything's great except for the little knob that switches the light settings is jammed and we don't want to force it and bust it so, for now, it's stuck on the "home" setting:(
customer_reviews.author: Stacey S

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup mirror around
customer_reviews.text: My brother ordered me one for christmas a few years back after my old one went out. This year I purchased the same one for my mom because hers went out. She loves it. I dont have one problem with mine. I use the outlet all the time. When my daughter was born i used it as a night light. I would order it 100 times more.
customer_reviews.author: candice martin

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror a lot. I thought I needed more than 5x magnification, but even with age related trouble seeing up close, 5x is good. I do not use the different light settings, but see how they might be helpful. I keep it on daytime all the time. The only downside as has been pointed out by others, is the flimsy stand. Be careful with it, or it may break off. They should be able to make a sturdier stand. Other than that, great. It may be a little larger or travel, but I ‘ll take it on a trip anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Lights are easy for my eyes and provide enough brightness to deal with whatever I am using the mirror for. The folding sides are convenient and protect the mirror. The adjustable stand helps reach many angles. The only issue that I have with it is that when the adjustable stand is folded up to put the mirror away it falls down and could easily be knocked loose or broken. Be mindful of this and you'll likely be happy about the product as I am.
customer_reviews.author: dreammer

customer_reviews.title: Distorted Image
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to write a thorough review explaining the problem I have with this mirror, but it keeps getting rejected. I have checked it over and over and can't see why... anyway. The magnification mirror provides such a distorted image (due to the necessary concave glass), you have to be about 3 inches away to see anything clearly. Even then the field of view that is useful is very small. If you need this side of the unit, it may not be what you are looking for. The single magnification side of the unit seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the one I had
customer_reviews.text: I had my original makeup mirror for more than 25 years---with the same bulb even. It finally broke and I desperately wanted the same one. This is it. We'll see how long the bulb lasts, but it's made just as sturdy as the first one which I cannot believe since most things aren't make that well today. I need the magnifying side because I'm 57. LOL!!! I also love the different light settings. It's definitely not for travel but It's my absolutely favorite mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Turk

customer_reviews.title: love lighted mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: i started using this kind of mirror when i was 16. they last a long time, but are very hard to find, so i ordered 4!!!! should last the rest of my life. hahahah love how magnified your face is to pluck eyebrows , do make up.. i'm 50 and its hard to make up on with glasses, so this is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: stefanie-seattle

customer_reviews.title: Magnified  side.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be like the old one I used to have for thirty years. The light is very good and doesn't get hot. I like having the extra plug in on the front. The magnified side of the mirror leaves a lot to be desired. It's like a fun house mirror. Too much magnification. I can't find a mirror any where with less though.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Null

customer_reviews.title: closest to old school conair
customer_reviews.text: i went thru about 6 mirros after myold conair mirror bubls burnt out & they no longer make 10watt bulbs & the 20 watt bulbs (that it even says on the conair mirror not to use over 10 watts & I called conair, they said use 20 watts,) & they make it so bright , you see spots I find this mirror closest to it. The different light settings are weird colors but the brightness is perfect, so i'll probably only use 1 light setting, but it's bright enough & I don't see spots! Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Just like old times
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. It is very bright. I have poor eyesight so I love that the middle large mirror can be turned to 5X which I have it on all the time. I also like that you can change the light colors which may be necessary for different times of day when applying make up. It reminds me of the mirror my mother had in the 70s. The plug is only useful for my cell phone charge when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise554

customer_reviews.title: Poor Lighting
customer_reviews.text: The lighting was not bright enough on any of the light settings and I don't find the wing mirrors helpful. In fact they are just in the wsy, I wish I could remove them. The mirror flips up and down, not left to right. I used to have the ConAir, no wing mirrors, but it died and I couldn't find another one anywhere. This will do until I find something better.
customer_reviews.author: KC Scout

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Perfect Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandmother she had one years ago but could never find another like it in store. The quality of the lighting is excellent and the magnification is perfect... Especially love the feature of being able to filter the color of the lighting! Such a good mirror for doing make up. It might be a little big to travel but perfect for daily use
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I wish this mirror were a bit less bulky, but I love the wing mirrors and center flip mirror, which ironically make it bulky.lol. It is exactly as described and works exactly as my previous Jerome mirror, which lasted about 8-9 years before light element died.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Wife approved.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my wife. Her vanity table is in a relatively poorly lit area of our bedroom and this has solved that problem. She really likes the different light filters and says that the magnification is nice without being too powerful. The folding side mirrors allow for plenty of mirrored real estate without taking up too much storage space. It's focus is function over form as it is definitely not as attractive as some lighted mirrors, however it works well enough to make up for its looks.
customer_reviews.author: bfg900

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I like the mirror except for one thing. It doesn’t sit level...it rocks from side to side. The support that comes out in the bottom and goes straight back to engage the metal bar is in the way. Baffling that a designer would leave it that way. Love the mirrors, the size, and the 4 different lights.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: but finding this a horrible replacement for the similar lighted mirror I'd used for ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to mess w/the bother of a return, but finding this a horrible replacement for the similar lighted mirror I'd used for decades. The lights are not that bright, but the worst feature is the magnification mirror - which is the reason I use a lighted mirror. It is concave and completely distorted. Worse than a fun house mirror. I almost get motion sickness trying to use it! Hopefully, the regular view mirror will work for me. The side mirrors only a distraction. Their best feature is when closed, keeping dust off the mirror. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: My mirror's bulbs bit it, so I had to get another magnified lighted make up mirror. I did shop around some, this mirror is by far the best one I saw. It has an actual on off switch so it's always on the lighting you use most. The side mirrors swing out enough to aligning with the center mirror (if you want them out of the way) and the center mirror is much larger than my last lighted tri-mirror. Definitely worthy of 5 stars !
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love my mirror
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mirror in the past and the light lasted about 15 years! I love it to put my makeup on and the different light settings are great! Highly recommend. They are too big to stick in your suit case though, I have a little hand held one for that.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Ursi

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: The lighting color options are interesting but I don't find them especially useful. The lighting, regardless of the setting, is really quite dim. I do like the ability to adjust the angles of the mirrors both horizontally and vertically. It has its pluses and minuses, which about equal out, so I think it's perfectly mediocre. It will do the job, but not alone, you definitely need a lot of other light to see well.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent make up mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome make up mirror! I had a Conair that outlasted my marriage (18 years), and this is as close to that one as I could find. I love the environment settings; from home, to office, etc. The brightness level for all settings is perfect. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: I previously had this same mirror for over 15 years and it traveled many thousands of miles in my luggage wrapped in a towel. It is bigger than most mirrors but it never broke and provided great lighting for applying makeup in the worst hotel room lighting or no lighting. The old one was looking pretty rough so was glad to see that this is essentially the same mirror and works great. Btw I never had to replace the bulbs in the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second Time to Purchase This Same Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to purchase this exact mirror as I blew up the first one when I accidentally plugged it into a 220 outlet on a ship. It's better than any mirror I've tried before. I like bright lights so if it could be just a little brighter I would give it 5 stars, but purchasing it again speaks volumes.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic light, a little difficult to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is what I use to get ready in the morning. I pop open the blinds right next to my desk to add some more natural light, but this light and mirror are great. I only ever use it on the "daylight" setting, since that matches my office lighting better than the other options. The only real issue I have with it is that it's a dust magnet, and I'm wiping it down at least once every other day. The plastic likes dust, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rushing

customer_reviews.title: It's a little too lightweight/flimsy and different "lighting" is far from great.
customer_reviews.text: Cumbersome to move the knob that switch the filters from the different settings. The filters are not great and do not truly replicate the different settings. However, if you ignore what the settings stated and just select the light to best simulate the lighting you want, you'll be OK with this product. I like the convenient outlet in the front of the unit for hair appliances... however, you may want to weigh down the unit. it is so light/flimsy that the cord from anything plugged into the mirror will cause it to move back and forth with even the slightest move.
customer_reviews.author: Zulema - PRINTSMART, LLC

customer_reviews.title: That it works! My mom Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Mom is very particular about here makeup so when her trust mirror died she needed a new one but she couldn't find one any where. So I took it upon myself to try online a search and 3 clicks and it was on its way. She's very happy with the features and lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Glen Garant

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine for my needs. I am struggling with finding the correct lighting but the makeup mirror I had prior to this I’d had 20 years. It’s just been an adjustment to something different and it will work out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brand consumer
customer_reviews.text: This is used in my home every day. This is a replacement for one I had for over a decade and a half. (Same brand, magnification, and lighting settings). What I like about the current model is that the on/off switch is instant now vs. the hold of the switch until it lit.
customer_reviews.author: NJOYCR8N

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I had one that lasted 12 years, now the new one I bought didn't even make it 2 years. I should have returned it when I purchased it because the 5x mirror was too blurry and the right-side light didn't light up all the way. Now it just died completely. I will not buy their products again; definitely not nearly the same quality as they used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Lighting and Vertical swinging mirror
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars but for two things: 1) the lighting could be better. I put a lamp behind it to give me more light. and 2) I don't like the mirror moving vertically. I had one in the past where the mirror moved horizontally and it was much better to see the side of your face and better for angling to do your eyebrows. I will keep it though until I find something else.
customer_reviews.author: golfergirl

customer_reviews.title: good makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. The only reason I did not give it a five star is because the middle mirror does not stay straight and starts flipping to the other side easily. My last mirror flipped left to right, , this one has a top/bottom flip.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be as great as the one I had in the 90s, but it’s not bright. The tri fold mirror functionality is why I bought it, but it is so poorly lit it’s not worth it. Additionally, mine does not completely slide properly between the different lighting settings so, for example, to use the “day” lighting (which should be the brightest), the slider is partially on another setting at the same time, too. Skip this and buy an LED one even if it isn’t a tri fold.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: The best makeup mirror I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid makeup user who has gone brought a few different vanity set-ups, I absolutely love this makeup mirror. This one is so much better than my old Revlon one it replaces. The mirror flips down instead of rotates to switch from a regular view to a magnification mirror. The on/off switch is easy to use and the lights are nice and bright. The stand is reliable and it feels sturdy standing up on my vanity when I use it. With others, I sometimes felt like if I accidentally bumped it, it would fall, but not with this mirror. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lo Frenzel

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror and good price
customer_reviews.text: My wife was picky and we looked at a lot of mirrors. She seems to like this one a lot and that is high praise.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mirror! It is nice and bright and allows me to apply my make-up flawlessly. The magnification is fantastic for plucking little fine hairs that wouldn't normally be seen by thre naked eye. I like that it has different light controls for daytime or office because when I go to the office, my make-up would look different under the fluorescent lights than it did at home. This allows me to adjust my make-up to look good wherever I am.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, flimsy adjustment bar in back
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror BUT there is a plastic arm in the back with ridges in it to adjust. Very easily can break, for such a great mirror I can believe the manufacturer would put such a flimsy piece on the back made of simple plastic.
customer_reviews.author: kateandalismom

customer_reviews.title: Best make up mirror, well only make up mirror, I own!
customer_reviews.text: This is the make up mirror to get people! I can even charge my iPhone from it as I am using my other outlet to pump. Yeah I have a whole little mommy station going and this makes me feel gloriously pretty as I get ready.
customer_reviews.author: A. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this mirror. I didn’t investigate bulb replacements since it isn’t that expensive. I use daily for makeup and it does a great job. Lighting is good and swiveling is easy for magnification for applying mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Best Makeup Mirror I've Seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best makeup mirror I've ever used; about 7 since the 60's. The description for this item here only mentions that its magnification is 5x. That is only on one side of the mirror. Just swivel it around for 1x. This mirror permits full-face lighting and I find that the light adjustments for Day, Office, Evening, and Home are quite accurate. This was a nice surprise; with other brands' lighted makeup mirrors such settings were useless. Very pleased, I bought another unit; at this price I can afford the convenience of having one for the bedroom and another for the bathroom. I find no difference in quality and/or light features between them.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bottom support kept popping off. If it isn't on the unit, then you have to prop the mirror against something as it won't stand by itself. Also, the bottom support (the 'stand') was big and therefore took up a lot of space. Not a problem for me, but some might not have the room on their vanity to open it up. Lights were not bright enough for me to see myself. I liked the side mirrors but they were a bit ackward to use - I'll stick with my bathroom mirror and medicine cabinet (mirrored surface that swings out similar to how the Jerdon works) I am happier with my antique Clairol True-to-Light mirror but wanted the side mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Over 50 and Lovin' It

customer_reviews.title: It's horrible. Also I keep this mirror on the dresser ...
customer_reviews.text: The light setting on this thing is a complete joke! It's hard to get just a regular day type light. The colors on this sliding spectrum are either too red or martian green. It's horrible. Also I keep this mirror on the dresser so it slides around when I open the "doors". The magnification is good but the colors aren't. I just got it because sometimes I use the side mirrors but now I'm going to go ahead and order just a round or oval one with just an on and off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Watkins

customer_reviews.title: This makeup mirror is really nice, reminds me of the one I used when ...
customer_reviews.text: This makeup mirror is really nice, reminds me of the one I used when I was younger, but this is a lot better quality. It took me a week to decide which one to get, happy with this one but I also purchased the tao tronics led desk lamp to go next to it so when I need extra light I'm set. So great getting older and you need more light! lol NOT
customer_reviews.author: smilewithme

customer_reviews.title: Light color a bit off
customer_reviews.text: The mirror comes with a slide to change the lighting from home to office to daylight, etc. However, the colors are all off quite a bit. They are either too yellow, too pink, too blue. The rest of the mirror is very well made and the magnifier is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Make-up mirror
customer_reviews.text: I had this same exact mirror from another manufacturer and used it for years until I lost it in a move. I'm extremely happy with this purchase because it's the same exact make up mirror! I could not be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Moody

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is everything I’ve been looking for! It’s a bit clunky but its effective super bright lighting overrides any qualms about that. I’ve tried sleeker LED mirrors and they don’t hold a candle to this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with poor eyesight!
customer_reviews.text: The brightness is really good, would have liked it just a little bit brighter. (My eyes aren't so good!) 5xs magnification is really nice! I didn't think it would be enough....but it is! Very happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: So happy they still sell these!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST GREATEST makeup mirror ever. I had one when I was 16, even though I unfortunately had awful acne back then. This mirror helped me cover my blemishes cause of the different light modes and magnified mirror behind the the regular mirror. Thank you for helping me through highschool and nowadays cover up my dark circles hahaha.
customer_reviews.author: evan

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I needed one!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a make-up mirror before but bathroom space is frequently limited due to both of us getting ready at the same time. I use the mirror at my desk so the bathroom can be used by others. It is a perfect size, and I haven't had any problems with the lights at all. It is light and stores easily. It may be slightly fragile so you have to be careful with the stand at the back. I find that the magnifying mirror helps a lot, again, never thought I would want to see myself magnified, but I feel better about the make-up job. The lights for different environments, office, day, evening, home, help as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Doggy

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror! Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mirror for over three years now and it is a great mirror for doing your makeup. I don’t use the magnified side too often (scary seeing everything that close) but it is great for cleaning up eyebrows or extracting blackheads. It’s very easy to switch between light settings and in the length of time I’ve had my mirror with daily use, I’ve yet to have to replace the bulb. I would highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Wood

customer_reviews.title: These are one of the products worth purchasing for anybody who loves applying makeup or skincare.
customer_reviews.text: Definately worth the purchase...arrived on time. lit correctly. Ive dropped it several times, accidentaly, and the bulbs havent broken. very durable.I would recmmend this one over the others.
customer_reviews.author: Candyapples2427

customer_reviews.title: So-So Light
customer_reviews.text: Just not nearly as good as the one I had before, I think was Clairol. I do use it, but need to use another light close by, and another swivel mirror. It is all kind of awkward. People with really good eye sight might find it OK.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Fae

customer_reviews.title: Five years later....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in 2009, yes, five years ago. I intended to wait long enough to write a review, due to all of the mixed reviews, but then forgot about it until now. I use this every morning to put on my makeup, and it is still going strong. The lights are still nice and bright, and I have had no issues with this thing. Like other reviewers have said, you have to hold down the on button for a few seconds for it to turn on, but that doesn't bother me. I'm very happy with my purchase and hope to get several more years out of this.
customer_reviews.author: nyc_nightingale

customer_reviews.title: A bit clunky, but overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on-time and well packaged. Lights work great, and it's nice to have the option to change from "day, night office, etc." The only reason I'm not giving it 5-stars is because it's a little bulk. With all of the moving parts, it's also a bit...clunky, if that makes sense, and would be nice if the kick-stand in the back had a little more tension to it when securing it upright. None the less, I am definitely keeping it, as it works for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very nice makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very nice makeup mirror. The adjustable light settings do mimic real-life light settings. Fluorescent lights are always harsh and applying make up to look nice under the harsh lights is much easier with this lighted mirror. There's a light setting for all situations. I would have liked the mirrors to be a bit larger, but overall, I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: Two Rivers Trading

customer_reviews.title: Bummer lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the bulbs quit working two months after I got it. Can’t replace Light bulbs Without buying a whole new device!
customer_reviews.author: jim neuner

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple mirror, excellent light.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mirror after a failed attempt with a different model. We did not like the previous one because the light thing was not sufficient for my daughter. This one is excellent. I’d like to downgrade the product to fewer stars because it means my daughter is now wearing make up, but it’s not the mirror’s fault.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Make-up Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It's similar to one I had for many years and it has everything I need. I especially like that I can flip from normal view to 5 x - perfect for putting on my make-up every day. I had bought another one which came only with a small 10 x disk which could be attached when needed but it didn't work for me. At my age, I need a FULL 5 x to help with my make-up. I also love the lighting adjustments! I highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Twin

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for applying make up with different light settings!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 93 year old mother and she loves it! Bought this to replace the one (same brand) she had for 20+ years. This mirror is great for everyday use at home. Would not use it for travel simply because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same Story
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror mainly because of the great reviews, and I've really loved it while it lasted. Bright lights, different color settings, and the mirror was not morphed at all. Lo and behold, I started having the same problem where it partly light, then die out. I have contacted Jerdon about this, and even attached a private YouTube video so they could see what I was talking about. I got no contact back whatsoever. Bad customer service. I know they looked at the video too, because of the view count. Now I'm out a mirror... Maybe I'll go invest in an Ottlite next.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: The makeup mirror is perfect for me. The lighting is just what I needed. Bright! Has different light settings. Fits well on my vanity. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: bobbie croes

customer_reviews.title: Given as gift; DOA but past return
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a niece (hey, she specifically ASKED for one). Item absolutely DOA (won't power up, no power to aux plug on front either). Unfortunately, it's just past the 30-day-return mark for Amazon so I can't return. No mfr warranty either, so I can't return to them. Not happy with mfr or Amazon, at this point. Yes, the mirrors work, but without the lights it's not all that useful. EDIT to add: asked the spouse to take a look at it - he opened the case, found two wires which were not connected to anything and an electronic part rattling around in the bottom. Fixed now, but definitely not a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: M. Soar

customer_reviews.title: ... and listen 3 days at my door it was great she loves it it's the best gift I could ...
customer_reviews.text: My dear dear friend she really likes this she had one and then she moved and she lost it she probably donated it and didn't realize it she was upset for a couple of days but I got right on the Amazon and found it placed the order and had it 3 days later at my door it was great she loves it it's the best gift I could have gave her this year
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Hirsh

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, so happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a five star plus mirror only issue is my daughter took it over so I need to rebuy it. Lol the lighting is wonderful and I love how you can select lighting mode and it have side viewing. The three way mirror is so much better then the flat type. Great price point for what you get too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 things I don't like about this mirror is I need greater magnification and it sits too low on my makeup table do I have to put it on something to use
customer_reviews.author: Achand

customer_reviews.title: Good for makeup, bad for intense magnification.
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine applying makeup any other way. I really enjoy this mirror and the light options it provides. There truly is a difference between "office" and "day" and I enjoy being able to toggle between the others. My only complaint is about the magnified side of the mirror. The mirror has a curve to it but the curve does not aide in magnification; in fact, it makes it more difficult to focus. I have better magnification (for eyebrow plucking, etc) in my $10 round Target mirror than I do from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, really pale lavendar
customer_reviews.text: That's right, the color of this is the palest of lavendars, obvious when I put it next to my white bathroom wall. Not as solid as my old Norelco Satin. This one uses filters for the different light settings rather than different brightnesses of light. The angle adjuster in the back is flimsy and awkward when folded. The mirrors are good. The light is not even - good on the sides, not so good in the center. A little drawer would have been nice (the Norelco had one). Like the Norelco, you cannot change the bulbs when they burn out.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Wehr

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of this and found that with this one, the mirror is distorted on the sides of the mirror. Unfortunately had to send back. I did like the brightness but the mirror just wasn't right.
customer_reviews.author: tssun

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Gets really hot to use. Don't like trying to apply cosmetics while sweating. The mirror is smaller than anticipated and the position of the lights are too IN MY FACE, and make it difficult to see. For me, the light tones are not really true to what they are supposed to mimic. Useable, but not the best. Would not purchase again and will continue to look for a product that would work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L Wyllys

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly bright enough!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the flimsy plastic kickstand. I have a feeling it wouldn’t last long if I kept this. The main problem is it is way too dim. I thought with the options for color shifts it would be quality but not even close to decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old Jerdon with a cheaper LED mirror. What a waste of money! Jerdon is really the best I've ever had over the years. And they last for a long time before the bulbs burn out. And I mean years! The magnification and clarity are great.
customer_reviews.author: mary ann s

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased. The last one lasted almost ten years!! Improvements have been made. Good MU mirror for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TerLow

customer_reviews.title: quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Many times, I have shopped for makeup mirrors. This one is the best I've found. Large front and side mirrors are great. This is the third one I've bought. Now I have one for home and one for travel. This mirror lasts for a long time before needing replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Great for when you're putting on or renoving makeup, moisturizing, etc. Great view, from each side of my face. Very bright/dim lights. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Grey Sky Eyes

customer_reviews.title: The better to see me
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. My last one lasted me over 25 years & I only had to replace because the paint came off the mirror. I hope that good luck with this one. The side mirrors fold in to make it compact. The light settings are a great addition & the rotate mirror is great for going from regular magnification to 5x magnification. I am looking forward to many years with this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: TUPPERMOM

customer_reviews.title: How to contact Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to contact Jerdon LLC about your tri-fold mirror, DO NOT USE THE TELEPHONE NUMBER listed on Amazon nor in their paperwork. I finally located their number after listening to 2 telephone trees of sales analytics. The correct number is 800.223.3571. They do not replace bulbs but will be happy to send you the 2-pack to replace them with the "How To" instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to a friend :)
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is perfect! The side mirrors are so helpful to apply make-up. The magnifying mirror is great for grooming. I mostly use my light setting to day and don't find the others as useful. The best part about this mirror is that it can be folded and tucked away when you aren't using it. Very portable. I am taking a star off because I would have liked if it was a bit bigger and the different light settings were more functional.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best long lasting mirrow out there
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this exact mirror for 30-35 yrs. I was always worried about it breaking because I loved it so much. It finally died and I had no problem finding it again here. I have nothing to compare it to because I had no reason to but I must say this is the best mirror out there.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Used this mirror for at least 8 Years i just replaced my old one ( that still works Amazing) for a new one because the side mirrors broke :/! But i swear by this mirror! It is absolutly the best thing to travel with (though it is not campact). The different light setting are great for selfies! And the all around look it Gorgous!
customer_reviews.author: Angelyne

customer_reviews.title: Dim bulb
customer_reviews.text: The lights were very dim in all modes. Must have other sources of lights nearby.
customer_reviews.author: 4Calli

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Haven't had any issues with anything so ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Haven't had any issues with anything so far. I got mine for a lot cheaper because it said it was "open box" and damaged but I haven't seen any damaged areas at all. The only thing I'd change is I wish there was a lighting option that was a bit more like a regular "soft white" light bulb. I'm in my mid 40's and the lighting options seem a bit brash and tend so show my imperfections a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Single Thing I Don’t Love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this makeup mirror. There couldn’t be anything better. I love the different lighting settings, that the side mirrors move for different angles, and the outlet is super useful. My mother loved it so much she had me order her one exactly like it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the design is similar to the one I have used for years and worn out. However, this one has corrected a few flaws that my old one had. The middle mirror adjust from side to side which allows the mirror to adjust for the height of the user. Much better than my old one. I LOVE THIS MIRROR!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Pros- The product works well and is convenient because your able to get a close up view while you apply your makeup. The versatility of the lights are a plus. Con- The product is somewhat heavy and fragile so not the best travel item...but overall I'm happy with my item.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Oldie, but a still goodie
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic make-up mirror which has been around for decades! I bought this for my almost 13-year old daughter 2 months ago and she loves it. She loves the different light settings (although I always found that the daylight setting is the only practical one, still she thinks its fun to have options) and also the ability to plug in her curling iron directly into the mirror. This mirror is an oldie, but still a goodie and the price point is great for all.
customer_reviews.author: Frances H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup mirror. I like that it is big, it moves well, and that there is a 5 times magnification along with the standard. The 10 times magnification almost make up mirrors have is way to magnified and you can't see what you're doing. It does have different light settings, however they seem to me to just be ridiculous. The normal light works great I take this with me wherever I go! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror several months ago and use it every day. I am very pleased with it. The lights are bright enough to be able to see well in a pitch-dark room, the settings are perfect for getting rid of pesky shadows, and the magnification is just right to see every little detail. I have not had any issue with the bulbs - they are still as bright and functional as they day I got the mirror (yes, you do have to hold down the 'on' switch for a few seconds to pre-charge the bulbs). I would definitely recommend this product to anyone seeking a lighted makeup mirror, either for a dark room or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rise

customer_reviews.title: Points with the Wife
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves it, REplaced an Old maybellin one she has had for Years, Good and selective lighting feature.
customer_reviews.author: Laredo

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one I had in the 80's
customer_reviews.text: I had a tri-fold lighted make up mirror as a teen in the early 80's. I decided to purchase another one because I found that the lighting (or my eyes) aren't as good as it used to be. The light works great - it helps me apply make-up with ease - blending is much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror for applying makeup!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! Reminds me of the ones I used in the 60's thru late 80's! It has great lighting and the mirror is clear with no distortions. I still keep a large lighted magnifying mirror next to it though for convenience with closeups as the only con with the Jerdon is you can't just pull it up close to your face if you are hunting down that elusive hair, etc :) Now, I am speaking as a senior gal...I didn't need that separate mirror back in the day! :) Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tanzanite Gal

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for!:)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Been needing one for awhile,my eye sight kept getting worse and hard to apply eye makeup with glasses on or off:/ but the 5x mirror is perfect,I just flip it over when I do my eye wear:) and the front plug in is a big bonus for my straighner, I can do everything at once, sitting at my vanity! One happy customer!:) Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

product_meta.title: Jerdon Tri-Fold Two-Sided Lighted Makeup Mirror with 5x Magnification, White Finish
product_meta.description:
Jerdon Tri-Fold Two-Sided Lighted Makeup Mirror with 5x Magnification, White Finish

AMAZON.COM
High magnification, versatile illumination, and multi-angle viewing make this tri-fold mirror from Jerdon a virtual cockpit of makeup application. Structured for panoramic viewing, the mirror features two adjustable side panels, plus a center section with regular reflection on one side and 5X magnification on the other. Two bars of fluorescent lighting offer cool, glare-free illumination, and the color-correct light menu lights your face for day or evening, the office or home. A built-in outlet accommodates curling irons and roller sets, while an adjustable backstand offers 11 angles to work from. The entire unit folds up flat for storage. 

 Though the mirror does not feel as substantial as the company's all-metal models, it does roll several features into one compact model. In addition, the reflection is consistently clear, and the side panels stay put where you place them. Fully extended, the mirror measures 19 by 12 inches. Jerdon includes a one-year warranty. --Emily Bedard
feature_bullets: Adjustable magnification, lighting and built-in electrical outlet
Sharp look and attractive white finish will match any home décor
Includes 4 adjustable settings for daytime, evening, home and office environments. Glare-free fluorescent lighting
1x and 5x magnification options to make sure every detail is in place
Comes with a 1-year limited warranty ; AC Outlet ; UL/cUL Listed
This unit is 13.8-inches (L) by 3.75-inches (W) by 12.25-inches (H) in size and folds flat for travel or easy storage
